alert.note: Alert for Cascade; Chouteau; Fergus; Judith Basin (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 3:18AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Judith Basin, western Fergus, southeastern Chouteau and east central Cascade Counties through 400 AM MDT... At 318 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles southeast of Fort Benton to near Geraldine to 19 miles southeast of Highwood to 11 miles north of Geyser. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Geraldine and Square Butte. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
